    • Method Detail

      • getBuyClient

        public static BuyClient getBuyClient(String shopDomain,
                                     String apiKey,
                                     String channelId,
                                     String applicationName)
                              throws IllegalArgumentException
        Returns a BuyClient initialized with the given shop domain and API key. After you have added the mobile sales channel to your store, you can find the API Key and Channel ID in your store admin page. Click on Mobile App and then click on Integration.
        Parameters:
        shopDomain - the domain of the shop to checkout with, in the format 'shopname.myshopify.com'
        apiKey - a valid Shopify API key
        channelId - a valid Shopify Channel ID
        applicationName - the name to attribute orders to. The value for applicationName should be the application package name, as used to publish your application on the Play Store. This is usually the value returned by ContextWrapper.getPackageName(), or BuildConfig.APPLICATION_ID if you are using gradle.
        Returns:
        a BuyClient
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException
